alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Franklin County through 300 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carrabelle, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Royal Bluff, High Bluff, Yent Place, Lanark Village and Green Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
